scenarios.title: The Marathon Dinner
scenarios.setting: You just ran <highlight>10 km</highlight> for a charity <marathon>🏃‍♂️ MARATHON</marathon> and you're <starving>STARVING</starving>! 😫
scenarios.challenge: The dinner buffet looks <amazing>AMAZING</amazing> — rice 🍚, curry 🍛, salad 🥗, dessert 🍫, and juice 🧃. How much should you <actually>actually</actually> take? 🤔

scenarios.title: The Study Marathon
scenarios.setting: You've been studying for <highlight>6 HOURS</highlight> straight for tomorrow's <exam>📝 TEST</exam> and your brain is <fried>FRIED</fried>! 🤯
scenarios.challenge: Your mom just brought snacks — chips 🍟, sandwich 🥪, smoothie 🥤, and fruits 🍎. Choose wisely, because your <brain>brain's tired</brain>, but your body isn't! 🧠

scenarios.title: The Movie Night Feast
scenarios.setting: It's <friday>FRIDAY NIGHT</friday> 🎉 and your friends are over for a <movie>🎬 MOVIE MARATHON</movie>! Everyone's hyped! 🍿
scenarios.challenge: Everyone ordered pizza 🍕, popcorn 🍿, and soda 🥤 — but not everyone eats the same. Decide how much you'll take without <wasting>wasting food</wasting>! ♻️

scenarios.title: The Mountain Adventure
scenarios.setting: You've been <hiking>HIKING</hiking> 🥾 up a hill since <morning>MORNING</morning> ☀️ and finally reach a <campfire>🔥 CAMPFIRE SITE</campfire>! Exhausted! 😮‍💨
scenarios.challenge: Dinner time! You have soup 🍲, bread 🍞, and roasted vegetables 🥕 to pick from. Don't waste — remember you <carried>CARRIED</carried> this food up the mountain! 🎒

scenarios.title: The Birthday Bash
scenarios.setting: It's your <birthday>🎂 BIRTHDAY</birthday>! 🥳 You're at your favorite restaurant with friends and family. <celebration>TIME TO CELEBRATE</celebration>! 🎉
scenarios.challenge: Cake 🎂, pasta 🍝, ice cream 🍨, and juice 🧃 everywhere! Excitement can lead to <overordering>over-ordering</overordering> — make your plate <wisely>wisely</wisely>! 🤗

scenarios.title: The Lazy Sunday
scenarios.setting: It's a <lazy>LAZY SUNDAY</lazy> afternoon ☁️. You've done <nothing>ABSOLUTELY NOTHING</nothing> all day. Just <chilling>CHILLING</chilling>! 😴
scenarios.challenge: You're about to order lunch — burger 🍔, fries 🍟, and milkshake 🥤. Do you <really>really</really> need all that, or just something <light>light</light>? 🤔
